FORM 10-K

Sample Company Inc.

PART I

Item 1A - Risk Factors

The Company is exposed to significant litigation risk. We are currently involved in various legal proceedings, and adverse outcomes could result in substantial monetary damages, injunctive relief, or other remedies that could materially harm our business.

We rely on key personnel, including our executive officers and senior management team. The loss of these individuals could disrupt our operations and adversely affect our ability to execute our business strategy.

Our intellectual property is critical to our competitive position. Failure to protect our IP rights or successful challenges to our patents, trademarks, or other IP could materially harm our business and financial results.

We depend on third-party technology and services for critical business functions. Interruptions, security breaches, or failures of these third-party systems could disrupt our operations and expose us to liability.

Climate change and environmental regulations could impose additional costs, operational restrictions, or require significant capital expenditures to comply with new requirements, potentially affecting our profitability.

Item 1B. Unresolved Staff Comments

Not applicable.
